mapper.select: SELECT tb_device.id,imei,table_id,tb_device.ctime,tb_school.name AS schoolName, tb_room.name AS roomName,tb_table.number AS tableNumber FROM tb_device INNER JOIN tb_table ON tb_table.id = tb_device.table_id INNER JOIN tb_room ON tb_room.id = tb_table.room_id INNER JOIN tb_school ON tb_school.id = tb_room.school_id ORDER BY id
SELECT tb_device.id,imei,tb_device.table_id AS tableId,tb_device.ctime FROM tb_device INNER JOIN tb_table ON tb_table.id = tb_device.table_id WHERE tb_table.room_id = #{roomId} ORDER BY id

SELECT DISTINCT tb_device.id,imei,tb_device.table_id AS tableId,tb_device.ctime FROM tb_device INNER JOIN tb_table ON tb_table.id = tb_device.table_id INNER JOIN tb_group ON tb_group.table_id = tb_table.id WHERE tb_group.id = #{groupId} ORDER BY tb_table.number

SELECT DISTINCT tb_device.id,imei,tb_device.table_id AS tableId,tb_device.ctime FROM tb_device INNER JOIN tb_table ON tb_table.id = tb_device.table_id WHERE tb_table.id = #{tableId} ORDER BY tb_table.number
